root.name: Disney's Chip 'N Dale Rescue Rangers 2
root.description: OverviewLike the original game this is based on the Disney cartoon. It has the player platforming though many environments to confront Fat Cat once again who has broken out of jail. GameplayIt mainly focuses on Chip and Dale jumping throughout many stages. While they can't jump on enemies like most platformers they can instead pick up boxes and throw them at enemies. All of the stages also have RR icons to collect to obtain a bonus.
